gameRules:"

VIDEO BINGO RULES

Introduction to Video Bingo

Bingo is a game of chance for a single person that is played with 90 numbered balls and between one and four cards for the player. The bingo cards have 15 numbers
column691:
divided into 3 lines of 5 numbers each. The aim of the game is to mark the numbers on the card as the balls appear and be the first to complete one of the winning plays.

Buy cards

To start playing you have to get tickets. Up to 4 cards can be purchased. To buy a card
column692:
you just have to click on the empty position where you want to include a card. <\/p>\r\n \r\n

Winning succulent prizes at our VideoBingo couldn't be easier. First
column693: choose how many cards you want to buy. You can have from 1 to 4. The more you buy
column694:
the more chances you have of getting winning combinations! <\/p>

Once you have the tickets
column695: press the Play button to start discovering the 30 balls. Automatically the numbers that you have on your different cards will be marked in red. After the 30th ball appears
column696:
we will mark the prizes won in green on your tickets. But you will also see that some numbers are in yellow. These are the numbers you need to get new prizes. Luckily the game does not end here! <\/p>

We also give you the option to buy up to ten extra balls with which to get the prizes that resist you. If you accept the challenge
column697: you just have to press the Extra button to buy each of these balls. Keep in mind that the price of the extra balls is increasing. you will see the price of each ball in the place it will occupy on the display. <\/p>"

gameRules:"

VIDEO BINGO RULES

Introduction to Video Bingo

Bingo is a game of chance for a single person that is played with 90 numbered balls and between one and four cards for the player. The bingo cards have 15 numbers
column165:
divided into 3 lines of 5 numbers each. The aim of the game is to mark the numbers on the card as the balls appear and be the first to complete one of the winning plays.

Buy cards

To start playing you have to get tickets. Up to 4 cards can be purchased. To buy a card
column166:
you just have to click on the empty position where you want to include a card. <\/p>\r\n \r\n

Winning succulent prizes at our VideoBingo couldn't be easier. First
column167: choose how many cards you want to buy. You can have from 1 to 4. The more you buy
column168:
the more chances you have of getting winning combinations! <\/p>

Once you have the tickets
column169: press the Play button to start discovering the 30 balls. Automatically the numbers that you have on your different cards will be marked in red. After the 30th ball appears
column170:
we will mark the prizes won in green on your tickets. But you will also see that some numbers are in yellow. These are the numbers you need to get new prizes. Luckily the game does not end here! <\/p>

We also give you the option to buy up to ten extra balls with which to get the prizes that resist you. If you accept the challenge
column171: you just have to press the Extra button to buy each of these balls. Keep in mind that the price of the extra balls is increasing. you will see the price of each ball in the place it will occupy on the display. <\/p>"
